mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_esscharge_15m(ess_equip_id, metering_date, hhmm, charge) VALUE (#{essEquipId},#{meteringDate},#{meteringTime},#{chargeDischargeAmount})
INSERT INTO tb_essdischarge_15m(ess_equip_id, metering_date, hhmm, discharge) VALUE (#{essEquipId},#{meteringDate},#{meteringTime},#{chargeDischargeAmount})

INSERT INTO tb_essdischarge_hour(ess_equip_id, metering_date, hh, discharge) VALUE (#{essEquipId},#{meteringDate},#{meteringTime},#{chargeDischargeAmount})
